name: Warning
desc: See the properties of a warning returned by the Apple News API.

items.name: keypath
items.desc: An array of field names that uniquely identifies a field in the JSON input of the request.

items.name: message
items.desc: A user-friendly, detailed explanation of the nonfatal warning.

items.name: value
items.desc: If applicable, the value supplied in the request for the field specified by keyPath.
